attributes.action: Send my wife a huge bunch of flowers to show how much she is appreciated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sarah Royle is the most wonderful wife and mother and though her husband and children love her dearly she is definitely under appreciated so a jesture from the man who has a red rose as his party's logo would be much appreciated.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
